biblebot.slogan: Scripture from your Discord client to your heart.
biblebot.commandList:
`/{search}` - search for verses by keywords
`/{version}` - version preferences and information
`/{language}` - language preferences and information
`/{formatting}` - preferences for verse styles and bot behavior
`/{dailyverse}` - daily verses and automation
`/{random}` - get a random Bible verse
`/{resource}` - creeds, catechisms, confessions, and historical documents
`/{stats}` - view bot statistics
`/{invite}` - invite links for the bot and support server

See <https://biblebot.xyz/usage-and-commands> for more commands.

invite.description: See bot and support server invites.
invite.usage:
To invite the bot to your server, click [here](https://biblebot.xyz/invite).
To join the official Discord server, click [here](https://biblebot.xyz/discord).

For information on the permissions we request, click [here](https://biblebot.xyz/permissions/).

supporters.title: Patreon Supporters
supporters.listStart: Many thanks to our Patreon supporters

resource.usage:
To use a resource, do `/{resource} {resource}: {name}`.
For example, `/{resource} {resource}: nicene` or `/{resource} {resource}: ccc {range}: 1`.

parameters.resourceDesc: The resource you wish to use.
parameters.rangeDesc: The range of pages/sections you want to view, for example `1` or `1-5`.

language.status: Your preferred language is set to {language}.
language.serverStatus: The server's preferred language is set to {serverLanguage}.
language.relatedCommands:
**/{setlanguage}** - set your preferred language
**/{setserverlanguage}** - set the server's default language (staff only)
**/{listlanguages}** - list all available languages

setlanguage.argumentsError: Expected a language parameter, like `{english}` or `{german}`.

version.relatedCommands:
**/{setversion}** - set your preferred version
**/{setserverversion} - set the server's default version (staff only)
**/{versioninfo}** - get information on a version
**/{listversions}** - list all available versions

setversion.argumentsError: Expected a version abbreviation parameter, like `{RSV}` or `{KJV}`.

dailyverseset.description: Setup automatic daily verses on this channel.
dailyverseset.fail: Go to https://biblebot.xyz/daily-verse-setup/ to continue the setup process.
dailyverseset.failDM: Automaattista p√§ivitt√§ist√§ jaetta ei voida k√§ytt√§√§ yksityisviesteiss√§, koska yksityisviestit eiv√§t salli webhookeja.

dailyversestatus.description: See automatic daily verse status for this server.
dailyversestatus.status: The daily verse will be sent at `{time}`, in the **{tz}** time zone, and will be published in {#{channelId}}. It will use this server's preferred version, which you can find by using **`/{version}`**.
dailyversestatus.relatedCommands:
Use **`/{dailyverseset}`** to set a new time or channel.
Use **`/{dailyverseclear}`** to clear automatic daily verse settings.
dailyversestatus.fail: The automatic daily verse has not been setup for this server or has been configured incorrectly. Use `/{dailyverseset}` to setup the automatic daily verse.

dailyverseclear.description: Clear all automatic daily verse preferences for this server.
dailyverseclear.success: Cleared all daily verse webhooks successfully.

random.description: Display a random verse from a predetermined pool.
random.bibliomancyWarning: This command should not be used for bibliomancy - do not ascribe spiritual value to computer-generated randomness.
random.useInDMs: This server has personally requested that this command be only used in DMs to avoid spam.

truerandom.description: Display a random verse based on random number generation.
truerandom.bibliomancyWarning: This command should not be used for bibliomancy - do not ascribe spiritual value to computer-generated randomness.
